sentences.en: For instance, it may foster lateral growth in girth, instead of longitudinal growth.
sentences.cn: 例如, 它可促进周围的侧向生长而代替纵向生长.

sentences.en: I would order a lateral skull film.
sentences.cn: 我打算安排照颅骨侧位的X线 照片.

sentences.en: It is divided into two parts, the lateral and medial thalamus.
sentences.cn: 它分为两个部分 -- 外侧丘脑和内侧丘脑.

sentences.en: Jets of compressed air gave the aircraft lateral and directional stability.
sentences.cn: 压缩空气的喷吐使飞机的左右和前后都能保持稳定。

sentences.en: McKinnon estimated the lateral movement of the bridge to be between four and six inches.
sentences.cn: 麦金农估计大桥的侧向移动介于4至6英寸之间。

sentences.en: Measurement of the lateral strain can be accomplished using a lateral extensometer.
sentences.cn: 侧向应变可用侧向引伸仪来测量.

sentences.en: Peter estimated the lateral movement of the bridge to be between 4 and 6 inches.
sentences.cn: 皮特估计大桥的侧向移动介于4至6英寸之间。

sentences.en: The accumulation of oilis governed by lateral changes from permeable to impermeable facies.
sentences.cn: 石油的储集是受从渗透到不渗透的岩相横向变化控制的.

sentences.en: The compensation must be insensitive to temperature and to lateral dislevelment.
sentences.cn: 补偿作用必须不受温度和侧向不水平的影响.

sentences.en: The danger of buckling may be present here if sufficient lateral support is lacking.
sentences.cn: 如果缺乏足够的横向支承,这里就有可能存在弯曲的危险.

sentences.en: The forces in operation have the form of lateral or tangential thrust.
sentences.cn: 作用力的形式是侧向冲断或切向冲断.

sentences.en: the lateral branches of a tree
The muscle and fascial layers are incised lateral to a rectus incision.
sentences.cn: 在腹直肌切口外侧切开肌肉和筋膜层.

sentences.en: The subjacent and lateral strata previously have been compacted.
sentences.cn: 下卧层和旁侧层先已压实.

sentences.en: The wall is weak and requires lateral support.
sentences.cn: 墙体不坚固，需要从侧面加以支撑。

sentences.en: There are, in fact, two kinds of situation that involve lateral heat flush.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 有两种情况存在着横向热流动.

words.tran_cn: （尤指脑部的）偏侧优势；偏侧性

phrases.tran_cn: 肌萎缩性脊髓侧索硬化症
侧向加速度；横向加速率
横向位移，侧向位移；侧方移位
水平土压；横向土压力；侧向土压力
横向荷载，横向负荷；冲力
横向稳定性，侧向稳定性；横稳性，侧稳度

trans.tran_cn: 侧面的，横向的，[语]边音的
trans.tran_en: relating to the sides of something, or movement to the side
